org.at4j.comp.lzma

Class LzmaReadableFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.at4j.comp.lzma.LzmaReadableFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.entityfs.lock.Lockable, org.entityfs.lock.ReadLockable, org.entityfs.ReadableFile

    public class LzmaReadableFile
extends Object
implements org.entityfs.ReadableFile
    This is a ReadableFile that transparently decompresses the contents of a wrapped file using LZMA compression.

    The LZMA stream is opened on a buffered input stream whose buffer size can be configured.

    A ReadableFile can be made into a NamedReadableFile using the NamedReadableFileAdapter.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Karl Gustafsson
    See Also:
    LzmaWritableFile, GZipReadableFile, BZip2ReadableFile

    • Constructor Detail

      • LzmaReadableFile

        public LzmaReadableFile(org.entityfs.ReadableFile adapted)
        Create a new adapter. LZMA streams will be opened on buffered streams with the default BufferedInputStream buffer size.
        Parameters:
        adapted - The adapted file.
        See Also:
        LzmaReadableFile(ReadableFile, int)

      • LzmaReadableFile

        public LzmaReadableFile(org.entityfs.ReadableFile adapted,
                int bufSize)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create a new adapter. LZMA streams will be opened on buffered streams having the supplied buffer size.
        Parameters:
        adapted - The adapted file.
        bufSize - The buffer size for buffered input streams.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the buffer size is < 1
